summary:
I’m a Go-To-Market Strategist with a flair for Partnerships. Over the course of my career, I’ve closed the largest deal in company history 3x — often with some of the biggest brands on the planet like Microsoft, Costco, Expedia, Starbucks, Meta, and Nike — by building high-trust, long-term relationships. 

●	22+ years leading SaaS solution sales to Fortune 500s with direct and with Partners
●	Worked hand-in-hand with a Global SI to close a multi-7-figure deal with Costco 
●	Closed largest deal in company history 3x  in my career 
●	Created a series of executive events across the country that led to a 5x increase in pipeline growth in North America at  BMC 
●	Established improved processes for bi-annual customer meetings leading to team-wide pipeline growth improvements of 3x 
●	Deeply committed to the craft of Sales, continually investing my own time and resources to sharpen my skills and effectiveness

I’m recognized as a consistent performer and for orchestrating complex, multi-stakeholder deals, reframing solutions into business growth levers, and building deep relationships at the C-suite level. My success spans the full sales cycle — from pipeline generation to large-scale enterprise deployment.

I take a broad and creative view of partnerships, using strategies that range from co-selling and collaborative events to knowledge-sharing and ecosystem development. I’ve helped startups unlock new revenue streams through strategic alliances that drive net-new clients, and I’ve sold everything from highly technical software platforms, green-tech solutions, consulting services, and personal development programs.

I’m deeply committed to continuous growth. I’ve completed nearly 20 sales training programs and have invested heavily in developing my skills in value-based selling, networking, prospecting, negotiation, and communication.

You can reach me at lesley.carstens@gmail.com.
headline: Senior Go-To-Market Strategist |  Revenue Acceleration & Business Development | Enterprise AE l Speaker l Driving Revenue Growth & Strategic Alliances

position.title: Senior Account Manager
position.description:
- Managed and grew a portfolio of 25 named Fortune 500 accounts, driving revenue expansion and long-term customer success
- 178% quota attainment for FY YTD 2025 against a $1M quota

position.title: Executive Member
position.description: LEAP is a private exclusive network for members of the #LeapAcademy Program: executive leaders, entrepreneurs, and high achievers from around the world who inspire and drive growth and impact for themselves, their work and their communities.

position.title: Enterprise Account Executive
position.description:
- Led enterprise growth strategy for new and existing Enterprise customers across the Western US, driving sustained expansion including with Amazon, Microsoft, Google, Meta, Expedia, Nike
- 102% quota attainment for 2021 and 116% - quota attainment for 2022 with annual quotas ranging from $900K - $1.2M
- Closed largest deal in company history 
- Created executive-level networking events with GMs and VPs from Amazon, Microsoft, and LinkedIn

position.title: Coach
position.description:
- Coach job seekers on strategies and tactics that will enable them to land a better job faster
- Help job seekers deploy a process to dramatically increase their search activity and land more interviews
- Teach job seekers effective strategies that will get them more job offers

position.title: Territory Manager
position.description:
- Managed complex Enterprise and Mid-market sales cycles end-to-end, from strategic prospecting and opportunity creation to successful close and account expansion with a $1.4M quota
- Top rep in the PNW region 2018 and 2019 
- West region leader in revenue sold through partners 
- Made the Top 10 list for New Revenue every quarter in 2019 
- Developed and ran Executive networking events that generated new pipeline

position.title: Senior Account Manager - Automation
position.description:
- Achieved annual targets with an average of 32% YOY growth for Enterprise accounts in the Pacific Northwest  including Starbucks, Expedia, Nintendo and Pacificorp with a $1.2M quota
- 91% quota attainment for 2018 and 102% quota attainment for 2017 
- Created and led executive thought leader events that generated significant pipeline prompting rollout across all of NA, including one attended by Microsoft’s CTO

position.title: Senior Account Executive
position.description:
- Directed full-cycle sales strategy for new and existing accounts across a 7-state Western and Pacific Northwest territory, achieving strong quota performance
- 106% quota attainment for 2016 and 122% quota attainment for 2015 
- 2015 – Won award for most greenfield accounts

position.title: Senior Account Manager
position.description:
- Delivered sustained quota attainment across a 3-state geographic region selling to mostly new but inclusive of existing customers
- Hit quota all 4 years with attainment levels of between 104% - 201% 
- 201% quota attainment for 2011 & Rep of the Year

position.title: Senior Account Manager
position.description:
- Built and managed relationships with assigned accounts across a defined territory, finding new opportunities and guiding them through to close
- Consistently exceeded annual $2.4M quota  
- Closed multiple $500+ transactions

position.title: Senior Account Manager
position.description:
- Drove end-to-end sales execution for Enterprise and Mid-market accounts within an assigned territory, from pipeline generation to opportunity close
- Exceeded quota by over 150% 4 out of 7 years and over quota 6 out of 7 
- Quarterbacked team responsible for closing largest deal in company history  
- Key member of strategic biz dev team setting direction for enterprise sales teams in partner strategy, territory  management and sales acceleration
